1.name: bottom-bar-min-button
1.content: Limit the number of buttons on a bottom bar for more than one(floating action button doesn't count).

2.name: bottom-bar-min-centered-FAB-button
2.content: Limit the number of buttons on a centered floating action button(FAB) bottom bar. Each side of the bar should have at least one buttons.

3.name: bottom-bar-max-centered-FAB-button
3.content: Limit the number of buttons on a centered floating action button(FAB) bottom bar. Each side of the bar should have no more than two buttons.

4.name: bottom-bar-end-FAB
4.content: A style of using a floating action button(FAB) on secondary screens that require a floating action button and three to four additional actions.

5.name: bottom-bar-no-FAB
5.content: A style of a navigation menu icon and up to four actions aligned on the opposing edge, without floating action button(FAB).

6.name: bottom-bar-no-isolated-FAB
6.content: Disallow placing a floating action button(FAB) outside of a bottom app bar, as it makes it harder to reach.

7.name: bottom-bar-no-attached-keyboard
7.content: Disallow attaching a bottom app bar to the top of the keyboard.

8.name: bottom-bar-no-navigation-button
8.content: Disallow placing navigation actions in a bottom app bar, as they can be covered by temporary surfaces.

9.name: bottom-bar-no-repetitive-button-top-bar
9.content: Disallow placing a same button in both a top and bottom bar.

10.name: top-bar-no-illegible-image
10.content: Avoid placing imagery in a bar that makes the top app bar’s text and icons illegible.

11.name: top-bar-no-wrap-text-regular-height
11.content: Avoid wrapping the title text to two lines when using regular height of top bar.(It is allowed when using prominent height of top bar)

12.name: top-bar-no-truncate-text
12.content: Disallow truncating text, hiding the full title may cause misunderstanding.

13.name: top-bar-no-shrink-text
13.content: Avoid shrinking text to fit on a single line.

14.name: banner-max
14.content: Limit the number of banners should less than two.

15.name: banner-no-single-unclear-button
15.content: Avoid using a single button as a way to acknowledge a banner and dismiss it. A button to dismiss a banner should be paired with an action to address its message.

16.name: banner-no-single-prominent-button
16.content: Avoid using a single prominent action, its prominence may be distracting.

17.name: banner-message-no-link
17.content: Avoid including links in a banner message. All available actions should be represented as buttons.

18.name: banner-no-different-style-button
18.content: Avoid using buttons with different emphasis levels, which could appear to promote one action over another.

19.name: banner-no-stack-button
19.content: Avoid  stacking buttons unless there isn’t sufficient room to display them side by side.

20.name: banner-no-close-icon
20.content: Disallow using a close affordance icon as the only method of dismissing a banner. All actions should be shown as text buttons.

21.name: banner-message-no-icon-only
21.content: Disallow only using an icon to communicate a banner’s message since illustrations support the banner message but aren’t the primary method of communication.

22.name: banner-container-no-top-bar-same-surface
22.content: Disallow using the same color between a banner container and the top bar surface.

23.name: banner-container-no-overlap-bar
23.content: Disallow using banner that appear in front of the bar.

24.name: bottom-navigation-min-destination
24.content: Limit the number of destinations on a bottom navigation bar for more than two.(Otherwise use tabs instead).

25.name: bottom-navigation-max-destination
25.content: Limit the number of destinations on a bottom navigation bar for fewer than six.

26.name: bottom-navigation-no-tab
26.content: Avoid combining bottom navigation and tabs at one time, because it may cause confusion, as their relationship to the content may be unclear.

27.name: bottom-navigation-no-truncate-text
27.content: Disallow truncating text, it may obscure important destination information.

28.name: bottom-navigation-no-shrink-text
28.content: Avoid shrinking text to fit on a single line.

30.name: bottom-navigation-no-multiple-color
30.content: Avoid using multiple or low-contrast colors in a bottom navigation bar, as they make it harder for users to distinguish the active item and navigate to other destinations.

31.name: button-capitalization-text
31.content: Use capitalization for languages that allow capitalization.

32.name: button-lowercase-text-in-contained-button
32.content: Allow lowercase text as long as the button is clearly distinguishable from elements around it (like contained button)

33.name: button-no-wrap-text
33.content: Avoid wrapping text. For maximum legibility, a text label should remain on a single line.

34.name: button-short-text-label
34.content: Avoid text labels that are too long. They should be concise.

35.name: button-no-text-overstep-container
35.content: Disallow using button’s width that narrower than the button’s text length.

36.name: button-no-vertical-icon-and-text
36.content: Avoid vertically aligning an icon and text in the center of a button.

37.name: button-min-icon
37.content: Avoid using two icons in the same button.

38.name: FAB-max
38.content: Limit the number of floating action button(FAB) on a single screen that should less than three.

39.name: FAB-no-element-in-front
39.content: Avoid layering badges or other elements in front of a floating action button(FAB).

40.name: FAB-no-text-regular-FAB
40.content: Avoid placing text in a regular floating action button(FAB).

41.name: FAB-no-icon-extended-FAB
41.content: Avoid placing icon in an extended floating action button(FAB).

42.name: FAB-min-speed-dial-option
42.content: Limit the number of the speed dial transition options for more than two.

43.name: FAB-max-speed-dial-option
43.content: Limit the number of the speed dial transition options for less than seven.

44.name: FAB-transfer-menu-min-option
44.content: Limit the number of the action menu transformed from floating action button(FAB) for more than two.

45.name: FAB-transfer-menu-max-option
45.content: Limit the number of the action menu transformed from floating action button(FAB) for less than seven.

48.name: dialog-button-location
48.content: Dismissive actions (like ‘cancel’, ’disagree’, “Delete” or “Remove”) are placed to the left of confirming actions(like ‘OK’, ‘agree’).

49.name: dialog-no-button-simple-dialog
49.content: Don’t display text buttons in simple dialogs. The choice itself is actionable when tapped.

50.name: dialog-no-single-button-confirmation-dialog
50.content: Don’t provide a single action in confirmation dialog, as it’s unclear how to dismiss the dialog.

51.name: dialog-no-navigation-button-full-screen-dialog
51.content: Avoid using any navigation icon other than “X” in full screen dialog. Because full-screen dialogs can only be completed, dismissed, or closed, only use the close “X” navigation button.

52.name: list-row-no-middle-icon
52.content: Avoid placing supporting visuals (icons or thumbnails) in the center of the row, which can make it difficult to see the relationship between primary content and supporting content.

53.name: list-row-no-insufficient-space
53.content: Avoid giving insufficient space between list items.

54.name: text-field-no-adjacent-different-style
54.content: Don’t use both types (filled or outlined) of text fields next to each other.

57.name: text-field-no-filled-primary-color
57.content: Don’t design text fields to look similar to buttons, as they could be mistaken for buttons.

61.name: tab-no-mix-icon-and-text-title
61.content: Avoid mixing tabs that contain only text, with tabs that contain only icons.

62.name: tab-no-nest
62.content: Avoid nesting a tab within another tab.

63.name: tab-no-place-vertically
63.content: Avoid placing tabs below one another.

64.name: tab-no-attach-bottom-navigation
64.content: Avoid attaching tabs to bottom navigation as it can cause confusion about what action or tab controls which content.

66.name: navigation-drawer-destination-label-no-shrink
66.content: Don't shrink label text size in a navigation drawer.

67.name: navigation-drawer-destination-icon-no-repeat
67.content: Avoid using the same icon to represent different primary destinations.

68.name: navigation-drawer-destination-icon-no-vacant
68.content: Don't apply icons to some destinations and not others. Icons should be used for all destinations, or none.

69.name: navigation-drawer-no-extend
69.content: Disallow extend the height of a drawer beyond its contents.

70.name: navigation-drawer-individual-destination-no-divider
70.content: Don't use dividers to separate individual destinations.

71.name: divider-no-separate-individual-item
71.content: Avoid using dividers to separate individual items.

72.name: chip-min
72.content: Limit the number of chips more than one.

73.name: picker-left-and-right-margin-threshold
73.content: Avoid using more than 16dp from the left and right screen edges, as it creates smaller touch targets.

74.name: picker-hint-text-input
74.content: A text field that prompting for dates should have appropriate hint text.

75.name: snackbar-no-icon
75.content: Avoid placing icons in snackbars, using an alert instead.

76.name: snackbar-no-other-shape
76.content: Disallow significantly altering the shape of a snackbar container.

77.name: snackbar-no-without-elevation
77.content: Avoid displaying a snackbar container without elevation.

78.name: snackbar-no-same-color-between-lable-and-button
78.content: Disallow using the same color between text label and the text button.

79.name: snackbar-no-prominent-button
79.content: Disallow using a filled or elevated button in a snackbar, as it draws too much attention.

80.name: snackbar-no-dismiss-button
80.content: Avoid using dismiss action, as snackbar disappears on their own by default.

81.name: snackbar-no-stack
81.content: Disallow stacking snackbars on top of one another.

82.name: snackbar-no-overlap-navigation
82.content: Disallow placing snackbars in front of navigation components.

83.name: image-list-avoid-text-below-container
83.content: Disallow displaying display text below the image container, as it disrupts the layout.

84.name: tooltip-avoid-restate-textual-element
84.content: Disallow to use tooltips to restate visible UI text.

85.name: tooltip-no-shadow
85.content: Disallow to display shadows on tooltips.

86.name: tooltip-no-imagery
86.content: Disallow to display rich information and imagery on tooltips.

88.name: bottomsheet-no-fab
88.content: Disallow to use a floating action button in place of an expanding bottom sheet. Floating action buttons are meant for actions only.

89.name: bottomsheet-avoid-too-extend
89.content: Disallow to make tall bottom sheets full-screen upon opening. This places the top content immediately out of reach for users on mobile devices.

90.name: bottomsheet-avoid-increase-size-collapsed-expanding-bottomsheet
90.content: Disallow to increase the height or width of a collapsed expanding bottom sheet by stacking elements, wrapping text, or using long labels.

91.name: bottomsheet-no-overlap
91.content: Disallow to place expanding bottom sheets along the leading edge of the screen.

92.name: backdrop-no-swipe-to-reveal
92.content: Avoid using the swipe gesture on the front layer to reveal the back layer.

93.name: backdrop-no-content-beyond-container
93.content: Disallow let front layer content extend beyond its container, overlapping the back layer.

94.name: bottom-navigation-no-lateral-motion
94.content: Avoid using lateral motion to transition between views. Lateral motion is reserved for navigating between peers.

95.name: bottom-navigation-no-scrollable
95.content: Disallow using scrollable Bottom navigation bar destinations.

96.name: fab-no-individual
96.content: Disallow Individual components, such as cards, to have their own floating action button(FAB).

97.name: fab-no-immobility-while-switching
97.content: Disallow FABs don't move in unison with screen content, when switching between tabs.

98.name: fab-no-extend-FAB-above-bottombar
98.content: Avoid using an extended floating action button(FAB) above a bottom app bar, as the combination takes up a lot of screen space. If they are paired, the extended FAB should collapse on scroll.

99.name: card-no-flip-over-to-reveal
99.content: Disallow cards to flip over to reveal information.

100.name: card-no-contain-swipeable-content
100.content: Disallow Cards to contain swipeable content (such as an image carousel or pagination). Swipe gestures should also not cause portions of cards to detach upon swipe.

101.name: card-no-move-behind
101.content: Disallow to move cards behind other cards.

102.name: card-no-bump-elements
102.content: Disallow let cards bump other elements out of the way.

103.name: card-no-internally-scroll
103.content: Disallow cards internally scroll, as it could cause two scroll bars to be displayed.

104.name: card-collection-no-interactive
104.content: The container for a collection should not be a card, and the entire surface area of the container should not be interactive.

105.name: imagelist-no-swipe
105.content: Disallow swipe gestures on individual image list items. Image lists should be perceived as a group.

106.name: navigation-drawer-no-right-side
106.content: Disallow open a navigation drawer from the right side of the screen unless the app is set to a right-to-left language.

107.name: navigation-drawer-no-half-height-lanscape
107.content: Disallow opening a bottom drawer to half the screen height in landscape mode.

108.name: navigation-drawer-no-scroll-when-not-full-screen
108.content: Disallow scrolling a bottom drawer’s contents when it’s not at full-screen height.

109.name: navigation-drawer-no-activate-multiple-item
109.content: Disallow activating more than one drawer item at a time.

110.name: navigation-rail-no-horizontally
110.content: Disallow placing the navigation rail container horizontally.

111.name: navigation-rail-no-truncate-text
111.content: Avoid truncating or displaying an ellipsis in place of label text.

112.name: navigation-rail-no-shrink-text
112.content: Avoid reducing the type size to fit more characters into a destination label.

113.name: navigation-rail-no-wrap-text
113.content: Avoid breaking up longer phrases into two text lines if necessary.

114.name: navigation-rail-no-multiple-color
114.content: Avoid using more than two colors for destinations or low-contrast colors in the navigation rail. This will make distinguishing active items more difficult.

115.name: navigation-rail-no-fab-below
115.content: Avoid placing the floating action button(FAB) below rail destinations.

116.name: navigation-rail-no-bottom-navigation
116.content: Disallow using a navigation rail and bottom navigation on the same screen.

117.name: navigation-rail-no-navigation-drawer
117.content: Disallow pairing the rail with a permanent or persistent navigation drawer.

118.name: navigation-rail-no-repetition-destination-tab
118.content: Rail and tab destinations should be distinguishable when both are in use.

119.name: picker-no-calendar-if-distant
119.content: Disallow using a calendar picker to prompt for dates in the distant past or future, such as a date of birth. In these cases, use a mobile input picker or a text field instead.

120.name: picker-no-same-style-hover-and-selected
120.content: Disallow using the same style for hover and selected states.

121.name: progress-indicator-no-multiple-active
121.content: Disallow applying progress indicators to every button in your app. They can unnecessarily interrupt the user’s task.

122.name: bottomsheet-no-invisible-scrim
122.content: Disallow using an invisible scrim for modal bottom sheets. This can mislead users about their ability to interact with the rest of the screen.

123.name: bottomsheet-no-additional-action
123.content: Disallow adding additional actions to a collapsed bottom sheet. Those actions should only appear when the sheet is expanded, in the expanded area.

124.name: sidesheet-no-horizontal-scroll
124.content: Disallow horizontal scrolling in a side sheet or layout in a way that suggests horizontal scrolling. A side sheet’s narrow width leaves limited space to fully view items.

125.name: sidesheet-no-beside-navigationdrawer
125.content: Don’t place a side sheet (2) along the same screen edge as a navigation drawer (1), as the sheet may get covered frequently by an elevated navigation drawer (or be confused for navigation itself).

126.name: sidesheet-no-invisible-scrim
126.content: Disallow using an invisible scrim. This can mislead users about their ability to interact with the rest of the screen.

127.name: snackbar-no-overlap-fab
127.content: Disallow placing a snackbar in front of or behind a floating action button(FAB).

128.name: snackbar-no-attach-to-edge
128.content: Disallow placing snackbars flushed to one edge of the layout.

129.name: snackbar-no-side-by-side
129.content: Disallow placing consecutive snackbars side by side or next to one another.

130.name: dialog-no-ambiguous-tile
130.content: Avoid using dialog titles that pose an ambiguous question.
